graph.original_query: I need a 7-day Japan itinerary for April 15-23 from Seattle, with a $2500-5000 budget for my fianc√©e and me. We love historical sites, hidden gems, and Japanese culture (kendo, tea ceremonies, Zen meditation). We want to see Nara's deer and explore cities on foot. I plan to propose during this trip and need a special location recommendation. Please provide a detailed itinerary and an exhaustive HTML travel handbook with maps, attraction descriptions, essential Japanese phrases, and travel tips we can reference throughout our journey.

nodes.description: Research flights from Seattle to Japan (arriving April 15, departing April 23) to fit within budget.
nodes.agent_prompt: Exhaustively research round-trip flight options from Seattle (SEA) to major airports in Japan (e.g., NRT, KIX) arriving on April 15th and departing on April 23rd. Prioritize options within the $2500-$5000 budget for two people. Consider factors such as layovers, airline reputation, and baggage allowance. Document all findings including airline, flight numbers, layover details, total travel time, and price.

nodes.description: Research potential accommodation options in Japan (Tokyo, Kyoto, Nara) fitting within the budget.
nodes.agent_prompt: Exhaustively research various accommodation options (hotels, ryokans, Airbnb) in Tokyo, Kyoto, and Nara suitable for two people within the specified budget ($2500-$5000 total trip). Prioritize options with positive reviews, convenient locations near historical sites or transportation, and amenities that enhance the cultural experience (e.g., onsen, traditional meals). For each option, document the name, address, price per night, review score, and a brief description of its features.

nodes.description: Research historical sites in Tokyo, Kyoto, and Nara, with opening hours and admission fees.
nodes.agent_prompt: Conduct exhaustive research on prominent historical sites in Tokyo (e.g., Senso-ji Temple, Meiji Jingu Shrine), Kyoto (e.g., Fushimi Inari Shrine, Kinkaku-ji), and Nara (e.g., Todai-ji Temple, Kasuga Taisha Shrine). For each site, document its history, significance, opening hours, admission fees, and any relevant cultural etiquette or restrictions. Also, identify lesser-known historical sites or hidden gems that offer unique cultural experiences.

nodes.description: Research locations and schedules for Kendo, tea ceremonies, and Zen meditation in Japan.
nodes.agent_prompt: Thoroughly research locations and schedules for participating in Kendo, traditional tea ceremonies (chado), and Zen meditation sessions in Tokyo, Kyoto, and Nara. Include dojos, tea houses, and temples offering these activities to tourists. Document the location, schedule, cost, duration, and any prerequisites or booking requirements for each activity.

nodes.description: Research special and romantic proposal locations in Japan.
nodes.agent_prompt: Conduct exhaustive research to identify unique and romantic locations in Japan suitable for a marriage proposal. Consider scenic viewpoints, historical sites, gardens, and cultural landmarks that offer a memorable and intimate setting. Document the location, description, ambiance, accessibility, and any potential challenges or considerations for proposing at each location.

nodes.description: Compile essential Japanese phrases and travel tips for tourists visiting Japan.
nodes.agent_prompt: Compile a list of essential Japanese phrases for tourists, covering greetings, basic requests, and expressions of gratitude. Also, gather practical travel tips regarding transportation, etiquette, dining, currency exchange, and safety precautions. Organize this information in an easily accessible format for quick reference.

nodes.description: Create a detailed 7-day itinerary based on research, including travel times and activity durations.
nodes.agent_prompt: Based on the retrieved data about flights (`flight_options_T001`), accommodations (`accommodation_options_T002`), historical sites (`historical_sites_T003`), cultural activities (`cultural_activities_T004`), proposal locations (`proposal_locations_T005`), and travel phrases and tips (`japanese_phrases_tips_T006`), construct a detailed 7-day itinerary for a trip to Japan (April 15-23). Incorporate travel times between locations, estimated durations for activities, and allocate time for meals and rest. Ensure the itinerary includes visits to historical sites in Tokyo, Kyoto, and Nara, participation in Kendo, tea ceremonies, or Zen meditation, and a recommendation for a special proposal location. Optimize the itinerary for walking exploration and cultural immersion while staying within the specified budget.

nodes.description: Generate an exhaustive HTML travel handbook with maps, attraction descriptions, and travel tips.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the detailed 7-day itinerary (`detailed_itinerary_T007`), historical site information (`historical_sites_T003`), location details from accommodation options (`accommodation_options_T002`), cultural activity details (`cultural_activities_T004`), proposed locations (`proposal_locations_T005`), and Japanese phrases and travel tips (`japanese_phrases_tips_T006`), create an exhaustive HTML travel handbook. Include interactive maps, detailed descriptions of attractions, essential Japanese phrases, and practical travel tips that can be referenced throughout the journey. Organize the handbook in a user-friendly manner with clear headings, subheadings, and visual aids to enhance readability and navigation.
